name: WPB Product Tabs Manager for WooCommerce – Custom Product Tabs – Add Custom Tabs in WooCommerce Product Page
author: wpbean

sections.description:
How essential is the WooCommerce Tab Manager?

It’s essential for online shops to have WooCommerce Tab Manager. It’s simple to customize the tabs for individual products, which allows you to give customers more relevant information and makes shopping simpler. Sales and happy customers can’t grow without it.

The WPB Product Tabs Manager for WooCommerce Plugin is essential for online store owners looking to enhance their product pages. This plugin enables users to add custom tabs to their product pages, providing customers with more detailed information about their products.

Firstly, with this plugin, users can create unlimited custom tabs to display various types of content, such as images, videos, or text. Additionally, the plugin provides a user-friendly interface, making it easy to manage and customize the tabs to fit the store’s needs.

Moreover, the WPB Product Tabs Manager for WooCommerce Plugin is compatible with all WordPress themes, ensuring seamless integration into the online store’s design. Additionally, it is fully responsive, making it accessible to customers on any device, be it a desktop, tablet, or mobile phone.

Furthermore, the plugin allows users to set global tabs that apply to all products or individual tabs that only apply to specific products. This feature gives users complete control over the content displayed on each product page, enhancing the overall shopping experience for customers.

In conclusion, the WPB Product Tabs Manager for WooCommerce Plugin is a valuable tool for any online store owner looking to provide their customers with comprehensive product information. Its user-friendly interface, compatibility, and customization options make it a must-have plugin for any WooCommerce store.

Plugin Links:

Upgrade to the Pro
Demo
Pro Demo

Features:

✅ Add custom tabs in woocommerce product page.
✅ Any content can be added to the tab content.
✅ Shortcodes, iframes, images, videos, and tables are all supported for the tab content.
✅ The custom tabs have an easy way to rearrange them.
✅ With the tab visibility method, any tab can be turned on or off with a simple checkbox.

Additional Features in Pro Version:

✅ Adding tabs only for particular products, categories, or tags.
✅ Tabs with different information for each product, Adding information to a tab from the product edit page.
✅ Adding custom tabs when creating a new product.
✅ Easy drag and drop tab reordering system.
✅ Add, Rename, Reorder and Remove any Product Tabs.
✅ Conditional tabs. The tab can be shown only if the user logged in or not logged in.
✅ Any custom product meta value can be shown in the tab content using a shortcode.
✅ Tab icon and subtitle support.
✅ Disable all or some of the default WooCommerce tabs.
✅ Content override for the default WooCommerce tabs.
✅ Showing the tabs as an accordion.
✅ Five different skins for tabs.
✅ Tab content editing using the Elementor.
✅ Tab style management.
✅ WPML multi-language plugin support.

Video Documentation:

You may also like our other WooCommerce plugins.

sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin

  • Active the plugin.

  • In the dashboard, go to Tabs. And add your tabs by clicking Add new tab.

  • After publishing the tab, your tab will be added to the product page.
sections.faq:
How to change the tab priority of WPB Product Tabs Manager for WooCommerce?

When you add a new tab, you will see a slider for tab priority below the tab content. The lower number of tabs will show first.

sections.reviews:
Fantastic plugin and even better support

By maaike53 on February 5, 2023

Great Plugin. Great Support. Even added an additional feature for me. Incredible! You can purchase this with an absolute good feeling.

Perfect

By thinkeragency on October 11, 2020

Done the trick very easily.

Weak text editing settings.

By mexter on March 20, 2019

Weak text editing settings. For example, even the font can not be marked bold.

Don't Waste Your Money On This Plugin - Donate To Charity Instead

By mc1969 on December 9, 2018

After several years of buying WordPress plugins, I have formulated the golden rule "Don't buy it unless it is sold via Code Canyon" (having been caught with rubbish products from private direct sellers several times). Sadly, I broke my rule with this plugin, with the inevitable result. After purchasing it, I was unable to log in to retrieve my licence key, despite following instructions from the plugin website. Instead of an "Account" area, I was logged in to a normal WordPress User account which had no details of the plugin purchase at all. An email from support stated that they had logged in to my account and could see the purchase details. However, I was still unable to access the account even after following their instructions, and I subsequently sent a further email with screen shots attached showing the exact procedure I had followed for the login process. That was five days ago, and I have still not had a reply. To make matters worse, the plugin failed to deliver in several aspects (e.g. in Accordion mode all tabs freeze in the open position, the default Woocommerce tabs still appear despite ticking the box to hide them, the default colours for the vertical tab theme remain the same despite changing them to different colours to match my theme). For the reasons given above I have lost interest in this plugin and abandoned it. My advice to prospective purchasers? Do the same.

Can't customize content for each products

By geco06 on July 19, 2018

If you don't need to customize text inside tab for each products , you will enjoy this plugin.. That's not my case

Great Support. Nice Product.

By sfierst21 on September 3, 2016

Had an issue/conflict with my theme and the developers/support addressed it very quickly and released an update - like within an hour. Now it works great. This is a great plugin - works brilliantly.

Great plugin to fit my needs

By mosarrof on September 3, 2016

Really useful plugin to manage unlimited number of custom tabs. Very easy to use and customize to fit my needs.

Easy to use

By WingThemes on September 3, 2016

It's simple and really very easy to use. Thanks.

Worked perfectly

By John (dv1961) on September 3, 2016

Worked perfectly, thanks very much

Perfect Plugin for user

By Shah Zobayer Ahmed (speeedsam) on September 3, 2016

This one is perfect plugin for developer and user who can manage product easily by this custom tab manager.
